body_html:
@hsm207 thanks for reporting this issue! Sorry for the inconvenience.

This command should be functioning on linux and mac, for which we have unit test coverage.
For windows we don't have the test coverage. I remember running into the issue, possibly due to some Windows CR/LF peculiarities.

In any case, we'll look into it.

body:
@hsm207 thanks for reporting this issue! Sorry for the inconvenience. 

This command should be functioning on linux and mac, for which we have unit test coverage. 
For windows we don't have the test coverage. I remember running into the issue, possibly due to some Windows CR/LF peculiarities. 

In any case, we'll look into it.
